General.Name: Chongqing Sanxia Paints Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Sanxia Paints Co., Ltd engages in the production and sale of paints and coatings primarily in China. The company offers anti-corrosive, automotive, industrial, general purpose, architectural, and furniture paints, as well as graphene anticorrosive and high flash point coatings under the Three Gorges brand. Its products are used in various applications, such as bridges, tunnels, steel structures, aerospace, aviation, national defense, petrochemicals, railways, ships, wind power, nuclear power, automobiles, motorcycles, construction, furniture, light industrial machinery and other sectors. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Paint Factory. Chongqing Sanxia Paints Co., Ltd was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.
